Domestic Wildlife

Release year:
1999

James's old star rating:

★★☆☆☆

AVERAGE OR BELOW

James's old number rating:

8/10

Old site description:

There was a week left before my first year of college started, so I quit my job and became extremely bored. I wanted to make one last movie before the summer ended, but nobody was available to act, as usual, so I casted my dog and two cats. I just lowered the camera level to the ground and documented their daily activities and laid the classical tune “Blue Danube” over it all. The results are relaxing to watch.

James's old ratings:

Back in 2003 James included star ratings with each film he listed on his filmography on his website (the text under the star rating was his description of what the star rating meant). Later on he switched to ratings out of ten.

Eventually, he dropped the ratings entirely.

This archive is unoffical and run by a fan of Cinemassacre. Contact the Archivist
